title: Monrjiall.Intro.Head
body:
So… you are a head… but you can talk…

[[Mimir.Intro.correct]]

title: Mimir.Intro.correct
body:
That is correct, yes. 
The name is Mimir, by the way. 
A real pleasure, Mr..?

[[Monrjiall.Intro.name]]

title: Monrjiall.Intro.name
body:
[[I’m not telling you my name without knowing yours first!|Mimir.Intro.toldYou]]
[[Why would I tell you my name?|Mimir.Intro.why]]
[[Monrjiall, son of M’gsroell.|Mimir.Intro.meet]]

title: Mimir.Intro.toldYou
body:
But… I just told you my name… 
It’s Mimir, remember?

[[Monrjiall.Intro.Imember]]

title: Mimir.Intro.meet
body:
Well, nice to meet you, Monrjiall.

[[Monrjiall.Head.headAgain]]

title: Monrjiall.Intro.nameAgain
body:
Right! Monrjiall is my name. 
But you can call me Monrjiall.

[[Mimir.Intro.remember]]

title: Monrjiall.Intro.reason
body:
You might be an enemy, or someone dangerous.

[[Mimir.Intro.head]]

title: Mimir.Intro.head
body:
I’m a bodiless head. 
The worst I could do is bite you relatively hard if you came close enough... 
And I don’t need your name for that.

[[Monrjiall.Intro.safe]]

title: Monrjiall.Intro.safe
body:
Oh, right… Monrjiall is my name, then.

[[Monrjiall.Head.headAgain]]
